thread.title: Radio stars reveal their radio crushes
thread.title_full: Radio stars reveal their radio crushes

title: Radio stars reveal their radio crushes
text:
Radio stars reveal their radio crushes Andrew Bucklow news.com.au Radio stars reveal their radio crushes Andrew Bucklow news.com.au Who do Kyle and Jackie O admire on the radio? 
IF YOU’RE a radio listener, chances are you’ve got a favourite show that you always listen to on the dial. 
And the radio stars themselves are exactly the same. So which shows or personalities are popular broadcasters like Kyle and Jackie O and Kate Ritchie a huge fan of? News.com.au found out: 
Kate Ritchie from Nova’s Kate, Tim and Marty: 
“I’m not really a radio listener. But I do love Jonesy and Amanda because for my husband’s 30th birthday I organised for them to call him and do let him do the quiz in the morning and he won a blower for the backyard. The yard looks fantastic, so thanks to them.” 
Kyle Sandilands from KIIS FM’s Kyle and Jackie O show: 
“I don’t really listen to anyone else to tell you the truth. I have heard Hughesy and Kate and I think they’re excellent. I even thought they were good on Nova ... silly Nova to let them go. I also like the drive show on Nova, whatever their names are.” (FYI Kyle, it’s Kate, Tim and Marty). Other Stories
